body.p: As stated in the project description, eclim's main goal is to bring eclipse functionality to the vim editor. Here you will find documentation on the fuctionality that eclim provides.

You may use the navigation to the left to view configuration information (settings, suggested mappings, etc.), or to navigate the functionality documentation which is broken up into categories (java, ant, etc.).
Before diving in, you should first familiarize yourself with the following commands. After that, take a look at the docs for managing projects. Then feel free to move onto the other categories.

ul.li:
:PingEclim
Pings eclimd to see if it is up and running.

:ShutdownEclim
Shuts down the current running eclimd instance.

:Settings
Allows you to view / edit the global settings. For project level settings see the
:ProjectSettings
command on the project documentation page.
